sentences.sentence: Plasterers, trim installers, and others provide aesthetic beauty and weatherproof finish to any residential or commercial building.
sentences.translation: 泥水匠、装潢工人和其他一些工人负责建筑的美观和居民或商业房的防风雨装置。

sentences.sentence: A medium-sized interior decoration company said about 1/3 of its 60 plasterers can earn at least RMB10,000 per month, the Chongqing Evening News reported.
sentences.translation: 据《重庆晚报》报道，该市某中等规模的装修公司称，它所雇佣的60名泥水匠中，已有1/3者月收入过万元。

sentences.sentence: Besides plasterers, other people in the decoration industry, including carpenters, plumbers, electricians and lacquerers, also see their wages continually rising.
sentences.translation: 据称，装修行业，除了泥水匠外，木工、水电工、漆工的收入也节节上涨。
